data.name: Business Loan
data.description: Borrow funds for a Commercial or Business purpose with a variable or fixed interest rate.

features.additionalInfo: Open accounts, check balances, view transactions, transfer funds, schedule payments, BPAY, eStatements, SMS alerts, activate cards, change card PIN, mark card lost or stolen, loan redraw, loan status update, accept loan contracts and send secure messages.
Set up a pay ID to receive lightning fast payments.
Save on paper, receive and view your statements online with eStatements.
Access additional payments made to your loan. Minimum $500.

eligibility.additionalValue: A Permanent Australian Resident including those working overseas. Borrowing entities must be a Permanent Resident of Australia,

fees.name: Loan Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Mortgage establishment, Mortgage extension and Guarantee establishment fees are also payable, valuations and legal service work such as mortgage preparation charged at cost.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Principal and interest, interest only, guarantor loans. Non-Residential Security. Fixed interest rates as shown are for loans with a maximum loan to valuation ratio of 80%. Should the loan to valuation ratio exceed 80% then the interest rate is subject to negotiation on application. A fixed rate break cost fee may be payable and equates to a reasonable estimate of our loss caused by the break.

Principal and interest, interest only, guarantor loans. Residential Security. Fixed interest rates as shown are for loans with a maximum loan to valuation ratio of 80%. Should the loan to valuation ratio exceed 80% then the interest rate is subject to negotiation on application. A fixed rate break cost fee may be payable and equates to a reasonable estimate of our loss caused by the break.
